Chicago.River City (building): River City is a mixed-use building at 800 South Wells Street in Chicago, Illinois. It was designed by Bertrand Goldberg, to whose Marina City it bears clear affinities, and was completed in 1986. The building in the South Loop neighborhood of Chicago alongside the Chicago River houses a 70 slip marina, indoor parking, commercial space, 449 apartments (later converted to condominiums in 2001-2006, and currently being “deconverted” back to rental apartments in 2018) and even a preschool.
